read_ahead.description: Number of frames ahead to precache during playback.

static_cache_delay_milliseconds.description: Number of milliseconds to wait after playhead has stopped moving to re-start full timeline caching.

max_compare_sources.description: Maximum number of media sources that can be compared via xstudio compare modes. Playback performance will suffer if you try and compare many sources.

align_mode.description: Compare mode behaviour for media with different but overlapping frame ranges. 'Off' means line up first logical frames, 'Frames' mean align on the first frame number, 'Frames & Trim' means trim to the overlapping frame range only.
